name: A Figment of Discord
description:
A Figment of Discord takes place before the events of the previous Midori Fragments game, A Timeless Story.

The game features:
-Gorgeous artworks;
-100% original soundtracks;
-2/3 hours of gameplay;
-9 different endings.

Plot:
Human relationships are so frail. Luckily enough, Eris doesn't mind such things since when she was abandoned at the gates of Rosechild orphanage, deep in the woods. She held no significant friendship with the other inhabitants of the structure. Instead, she prefers spending her days with her only friend; the odd cat Millionmiles. Constantly keeping to herself with the orphanage low on food supply, could one mere apple break her quiet stance amongst the orphanage?
